docs: update test generator documentation and add export formats

- Update command references in automated-test-generation.md and
  GETTING-STARTED-TESTGEN.md to match actual package.json scripts
- Add forwardRef components limitation to documentation
- Add async/loading components troubleshooting guide
- Add documentation export in multiple formats \(txt, html, docx\)
- Add docs:generate script with docx library for Word export
- Update configuration files reference table

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
